Amicus, n. (Latin), friend or comrade.


Guild Amicus is a group of Everquest players on the Tunare server who through shared adventure and tribulation have come to forge close bonds of friendship. Many have of us have adventured together since Everquest first came online.

Amicus is not a typical guild. Established in October 1999, we have no lengthy charter, no rules, no hierarchy per say. We recognize that Everquest is an online social game, where the proper focus is on having fun, among ourselves and with other players and guilds. Do you agree? We'd like to hear from you. Contact any member in-game or email us.



Last updated: March 25, 2001
